name: Heroes United
description:
Credit:

Mimijackz: Sfx, Programming, Art

Romiik: Programming, Game Design

Konnie_6: Programming, Art

Play Instructions:
  1. press play
  2. drag the characters onto the grid
  3. press play level
  4. right click to determine where to move your army
  5. beat all monsters
  6. improve your setup

comment if you find any bugs or something unbalanced
